info: Rating, 5 stars,  路 December 2023,  路 Stayed one night
rating_comment: This is our second time staying at this listing and it was just as amazing as the last time. A really good and quiet place that had all the things needed to feel at home. Very clean Great and tidy place to stay. everything was smooth. Thanks for your hospitality.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  路 October 2023,  路 Stayed one night
rating_comment: Our stay at this location was truly enjoyable. The place was impeccably clean, located in a safe and secure area. The interior decor and furniture were tastefully done, providing everything we needed. It felt just like home. The accommodation was not only clean but also quite spacious. The check-in and checkout procedures were hassle-free, and the host was very responsive. Without a doubt, I would love to stay at this place again on my future trips.

info: Rating, 4 stars,  路 July 2023,  路 Stayed about a week
rating_comment:
The host was friendly. He along with his Spouse greeted us during check in. The apartment was spacious and suitable for 4-6 persons. We were a family of 4 persons. There were 2 bathrooms and one common toilet. ACs were functional.
However, a large refrigerator is a necessity for a big family, which we missed a lot. The refrigerator provided was small. Microwave oven was old and it took more than usual time to warm food. Finally, the location has less public amenities. There is no nearby street shop, outlet or pharmacy. One needs to go to the only common grocery store by walking 15 minutes.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  路 July 2023,  路 Stayed one night
rating_comment: The rooms were clean, very comfortable, and the staff was amazing. They went over and beyond to help make our stay enjoyable. I highly recommend this appartement for anyone visiting

info: Rating, 5 stars,  路 July 2023,  路 Stayed one night
rating_comment: Had a wonderful stay. ATM Momenul is a splendid host, always responsive and very understanding. will definitely come again if I swing by Dhaka.
Our stay was wonderful . Great location and good value

info: Rating, 5 stars,  路 July 2023,  路 Stayed a few nights
rating_comment:
As it was my first AirBnB booking I was very hesitant about how it would turn out the house, the owner, the environment, etc. But after staying there for 2 nights and 3 days one thing I really loved about this place is how much thought was put into the process of making it feel like
home rather than just "a place I rented on the internet". The owners were very friendly and made sure all my needs were met and went above and beyond to ensure my stay was as enjoyable and comfortable as possible. To anyone visiting Dhaka and wants to be hassle free from living in hotels and other rentals, stop searching and this is the home you want to make for your stay.
